name: Greenskin Invasion
description:
Dungeon Adventure: Greenskin Invasion it's second game in Dungeon Adventure series.Like first game it's classic roguelike with permadeath in fantasy setting. Some game elements was take from old school and tabletop rpg games.

This time heroes must defend lands from greenskin tribes. Defend lands from orcs, goblins, trolls, gather tons of loot and treasures. Select hero and begin epic adventure!

- Explore randomly generated dungeon, caves, wildernes areas.
- Permadeath - if hero dies need to start new game
- Adventure level system that allows to progress even if your hero died, bonuses from Adventure Levels affects all heroes.
- Different heroes with unique skills and abilities
- A lot of randomly generated loot.
- Craft epic equipment for your heroes.
- Epic quests!

Some features that people asking for original Dungeon Adventure already here:
- Inventory, now you can store your loot.
- More items slots: armor, weapon, boots and hat.
- Items have graphic icons.
- Better game balance ( I hope so ^_^ )

Full version bonuses:

- New hero Battle Cleric
- New hero Sorceress
- No in game Ads


Twitter: https://twitter.com/AdventurerRo
Facebook: http://facebook.com/DungeonAdventureGames

Thanks for playing Dungeon Adventure games! And don't forget to play other games in DA series.
